summary: A chaotic family go on holiday to Spain and get mixed up with a gang of diamond thieves
cast: Louis de Funès|Raymond Bussières|Annette Poivre|Guy Bertil|Véra Valmont|Jacques Dynam|Paulette Dubost|Albert Pilette|Sophie Sel|Max Révol|Jacques Bertrand|Louis Bugette|Roger Desmare|Jacques Dufilho|Marc Eyraud|Mario Pilar|Valérie Vivin|Trio Cervantes de la Puerta del Sol|Maurice Gardett|Luce Fabiole|Bernard Musson|Pipo
title: Taxi roulotte et corrida
